title: The Nobel Prize in physics is to be announced Tuesday
description: STOCKHOLM: Nobel Prize in Physics will be announced Tuesday, the second award to be revealed this year by the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences in Stockholm a day after a trio of scientists won the prize for contributions to medicine. title: India bears a special responsibility because Global South nations look to us for inspiration: EAM Jaishankar
description: India is a key player in global Artificial Intelligence, inspiring nations in the Global South. External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar highlighted India's responsibility in developing indigenous AI tools and frameworks. He stressed the need for safe and accessible AI development and deployment. AI will transform economies, work, health, and education, impacting every citizen globally.

title: Zelda Williams begs people to stop sending AI videos of late dad Robin Williams
description: Actress Zelda Williams - the daughter of the late actor Robin Williams - has blasted people who have sent her artificial intelligence (AI) videos of her dad since his passing in 2014.
content:
Zelda Williams has begged people to stop sending her AI videos of her late dad Robin Williams.
The Hollywood legend took his own life in 2014 at his Paradise Cay, California home aged 63, and his 36-year-old daughter says people choosing to make arti... [2233 chars]

title: Netweb Technologies shares more than double in 3 months. Should you buy, sell or hold?
description: Netweb Technologies shares are soaring, driven by strong demand for its artificial intelligence and cloud infrastructure solutions. title: AI must optimize home care, continuity, and early detection for older adults
description: HealthFORCE, a national alliance of leaders dedicated to addressing the root causes of America's healthcare workforce crisis, along with the American Academy of Physician Associates (AAPA) and West Health, today released "Aging Well with AI: Empowering Care through Innovation," the first in a two-part white paper series exploring how artificial intelligence (AI) can strengthen the U.S. healthcare workforce and improve access to care.
